artist: Painter: After Sir Nathaniel Bacon; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
inscription:
Signature, Title, and  Inscription

below image in black: Seipse pinxit  T. Chambars sculp. / SIR NATHANIEL BACON / From an Original at the Lord Viscount Grimston's Gorhambury | on sheet in pencil: 2-652  / handwritten  Only one other portrait of this Artist by ??? in Accd des P???
portfolio: Walpole's  Anecdotes of Painting in England
title: Sir Nathaniel Bacon
